definitions: Suggest or hint (something bad or reprehensible) in an indirect and unpleasant way.
Slide (oneself or a thing) gradually and stealthily into a place or position.
Maneuver oneself into a position of favor or office by subtle manipulation.
examples: He insinuates that she is lying.
The cat insinuates itself through the narrow gap.
She insinuates herself into the boss's good graces.
